attributes.review: This is an all around horribly put together app. It functions poorly and takes a very long time to load. After downloading my phone contracted a virus. This app was the source. I have heard that many others have had the same experience as me. Very disappointing... especially since this is a government owned platform.
attributes.title: bad app, got a virus

attributes.review: this app has ruined my phone for me. i initially downloaded it to find deals on tampons and feminine products however there is none of the sort! i’ve only found terrible politics and the app gave me a virus! it won’t stop messaging me on all platforms! imessage, email, you name it, there’s an message from this app! this app needs to be deleted asap!
attributes.title: this app is TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app literally gave me cancer! I don’t think it’s a problem for me but I wanna do you think you could bring me some food for me losing hair? I’m sorry to say that I’m finna be getting off work tomorrow night and I’ll be home later today and if y’all need anything else I can do that. If there is any way you could me one of your wigs that would be great!

I downloaded this app but it was horrible I don’t know why anyone would even download this app but whatever you do don’t by they way I had to get a new phone because it gave me a virus so unless you wanna pay a lot of money for your new phone or to get it fixed you better not download this
attributes.title: This app is a horrible app do not download it

attributes.review: Absolutely awful!!!! Hate this app with all my heart and soul!!!!! It made my pet llama go into cardiac arrest and when the mailman came to get it he went threw it back like a mad man. My toes went numb. My bellybutton fell off. My phone exploded in the microwave so i’m writing this review on my purple 3DS. My whole house disappeared so I’m laying on the dirt where my bed would be. All because of this exceedingly awful app!!
attributes.title: AWFUL DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY FISH DIED

attributes.review: The minute I got this app I hated it. I saw Donald Duck working out 🤢🤢. I showed it to my pet catipillar to see if she liked it and you wanna know what happened? SHE DIED CUZ THE APP WAS SO BAD😿😾.  I WILL GET JUSTICE FOR WATILDA!!!  Anyway this app is trash and I highly recommend that you take it off the App Store. I would not want to see someone else’s pet caterpillar die because of how bad this app is. 👾👹💅🏻😡😬👻😽👹💫👺👻😽🧦🕧👹🤗👺👾🤗👻👺👹🧑🏻‍🍳👁👀💂‍♂️👨‍🎨🧑‍🏫🧚‍♂️🧜🏿‍♂️
attributes.title: Trash just like Trump👺🤡😼🤪✨

attributes.review: I used to support this Cheeto man,and  when I found out he had an app, I was soo excited to get it. I eagerly downloaded it, but now I wish I didn’t.. when I got digging into the app, there was nazi propaganda EVERYWHERE. They also said that anyone who isn’t white is going to be electric chaired. They also told me I smell bad, and threatened me if I wore a mask. I’m terrified, save yourself and don’t download the app!! 😳😳
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: There is not a single good thing about this app and I have traumatized my children after they had taken my phone and downloaded this trash. Never in my life have my children screamed so loud and one even collapsed on the floor screaming bc his eyes were literally melting!! So I wouldn’t recommend to my worst enemy to even  lay their eyes upon this atrocity!!!!
attributes.title: Crappy and I don’t recommend

attributes.review: I thought because Trump was POTUS his app would be more like my main man Obama but I was wrong!  Everything the app did was full f lies and the app turned everything on my phone an ugly shade of orange. I hope if I delete the app my iPhone will not be permanently damaged. When I called tech support they suggested I vote blue in November to eliminate this awful person from our White House!
attributes.title: This app was full of lies

attributes.review: this app is so bad!!! i downloaded it so i could follow the big cheeto’s updates about his circus-i mean, campaign and now it’s making my phone glitch!!! the app crashes and then my phone screen flashes a photo of trump dancing. AND HES NAKED!!!!! HIS CHEETO PP IS FLOPPING ALL OVER MY SCREEN and my battery is getting drained!!!! this app looks like it was designed by a two year old blind squirrel. truly a terrible disappointment
attributes.title: app is so bad
